page.title: 11Shops in Sheering
page.content: In{Sheering}there are only four shops - a grocers, a butchers, a hairdressers and a Post Office. At one time the shops were all joined together and the buildings are about 400 years old. A lot of the customers come from Sheering. Some of the customers are outsiders who are passing through the village on their way to{Chelmsford}or{Harlow.}They find it easy to park their cars and pop into the grocers or Post Office to make their purchases. Senior citizens from Sheering use the hairdressers the most. In{Lower Sheering}there is only one shop which serves as a Post Office, sweet shop,off-licence and grocers. Five people are employed at the shop. The fresh meat comes from the butchers in Upper Sheering and the cakes from Hatfield Heath.
